text: Alfonso Domínguez Guíñez (18 December 1916 in Santiago, Chile – 1973) was a Chilean footballer. He played as a forward. ==Teams== * Badmintón 1937 * Unión Española 1937-1938 * Colo Colo 1939-1943 * Universidad de Chile 1943 * Colo Colo 1944-1947 ==Titles== * Colo Colo 1939, 1941, 1944 and 1947 (Primera División), 1940 (Copa Apertura), 1945 (Champions Championship) ==Honours== * Colo Colo 1939 and 1944 (Top Scorer Chilean Primera División Championship) ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1916 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Chilean footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Chile international footballers Category:Colo-Colo footballers Category:Badminton F.C. footballers Category:Unión Española footballers Category:Universidad de Chile footballers Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:Sportspeople from Santiago
title: Alfonso Domínguez (Chilean footballer)
